Reviews.Title: Good in specs, not reality
Reviews.Author: JennA
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my daughter so she would have one of her very own for vacations and such.  While the specs of a 10.1 MP and big screen sounded great, once we used it, it was very disappointing.  The screen is very grainy, which makes it hard to tell if the picture came out well or not.  Also, even though the it has a high megapixel count, the photos come out very grainy (even when set at the highest level).  It is automatically set to have no flash, so every time you turn it on, you have to change that setting.  There is no way to make 'auto-flash' the standard setting.  Overall, not a good buy, we have taken it back to the store, and are looking for a better option.

Reviews.Title: not very good
Reviews.Author: E.Noel...this game was fun but it could have ...
Reviews.Content: i got this camera a while ago for Christmas and thought it would be good because of the megapixel count. it's not. it's very blurry. i would not recommend this to a friend! i now have to save up for another camera!

Reviews.Title: Don't  buy it
Reviews.Author: Ana I. Severino
Reviews.Content: Very grainy, I thought it would be good because of the megapixels.  Don't waste your money! I COULDN'T TAKE IT BACK TO THE STORE BECAUSE I THREW AWAY THE BOX.

ProductInfo.Features:
Point & Shoot
CMOS
Built-in flash
Auto Mode, Fill-in Mode, OFF mode, Red-eye Reduction
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar ViviCam X029 10.1 MP 2.4-in Screen with 4x Zoom Digital Camera (Silver)
